headline: TFC Q4 Earnings Beat Despite Y/Y Rise in Expenses, Stock Dips
summary: Truist Q4 adjusted EPS beats estimates. Higher expenses and credit provisions offset gains in NII, fees and loan growth.

headline: PNC Financial price target raised to $284 from $268 at Oppenheimer
summary: Oppenheimer raised the firm’s price target on PNC Financial (PNC) to $284 from $268 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm notes PNC reported a strong close to 2025 and management highlighted the organic tailwinds it expects to benefit from in 2026, coupled with the inorganic benefit of the January acquisition of FirstBank. Oppenheimer continues to prefer commercial banks over investment banks.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools

headline: Peoples Bancorp And 2 Other Top Dividend Stocks For Your Portfolio
summary: In the midst of heightened geopolitical tensions and market volatility, as evidenced by recent sharp declines in major U.S. stock indices following tariff threats, investors are increasingly seeking stability through dividend stocks. These stocks can provide a reliable income stream and potential for long-term growth, making them an attractive option during uncertain times.
